mapper.insert: insert into wms_store ( store_id, code, name, building_no, floor_no, sort_order, status, remark, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime )values ( #{storeId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{buildingNo}, #{floorNo}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{ctime}, #{modifier}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update wms_store
store_id=#{storeId},
code=#{code},
name=#{name},
building_no=#{buildingNo},
floor_no=#{floorNo},
sort_order=#{sortOrder},
status=#{status},
remark=#{remark},
creator=#{creator},
ctime=#{ctime},
modifier=#{modifier},
mtime=#{mtime},
store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.select: select store_id, code, name, building_no, floor_no, sort_order, status, remark, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from wms_store where store_id=#{storeId}
select store_id, code, name, building_no, floor_no, sort_order, status, remark, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from wms_store where name=#{name}
select store_id, code, name, building_no, floor_no, sort_order, status, remark, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from wms_store where store_id=#{storeId}

select store_id, code, name, building_no, floor_no, sort_order, status, remark, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}

SELECT * FROM wms_store WHERE store_id in
#{item}

select store_id, code, name, building_no, floor_no, sort_order, status, remark, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from wms_store
find_in_set(store_id,#{enName})
